item.title: National Guard Patrols Begin to Carry Weapons in D.C.
item.description: More than 2,200 troops were deployed in Washington as of Sunday, a Guard spokesman said.

item.title: This Is the End of China’s Once Mightiest Property Firm
item.description: China Evergrande, set to be delisted from the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on Monday, leaves behind a giant pile of debt and a long line of desperate cred...

item.title: SpaceX Scrubs Critical 10th Test Launch of Starship Rocket
item.description: Elon Musk’s company will reschedule the next trip of its Starship prototype, which faced setbacks in its last three flight attempts.

item.title: Russia’s Top Diplomat Says There Is No Plan for Putin-Zelensky Meeting
item.description: The statement by Foreign Minister Sergey V. Lavrov deals a blow to President Trump’s efforts to mediate an end to the war in Ukraine.

item.title: After Trump’s Threat to Send National Guard to Chicago, Democrats Push Back
item.description: President Trump said he was considering sending troops to Chicago, New York and Baltimore. State and local leaders say they have crime under control.
